title: How to get access?
subtitle:
In order to gain access, you must purchase 1 of 3 subscriptions.
 You can also try a free 7-day trial.

community.title: Cryptocommunity
community.subtitle: Closed community for real crypto enthusiasts, which will allow you to always be aware of everything that happens in the industry.

item1.title: Training
item1.description: Regular live lectures on various topics, market/portfolio reviews, conferences and discussions about cryptocurrencies

item2.title: Analytics
item2.description: Daily summary of analytics on the market situation, recommendations for asset purchases and a set of positions

item3.title: Crypto News
item3.description: Tracking and collecting the latest news from the crypto world in one place, Twitter & Binance tracker

item4.title: Community
item4.description: Friendly and responsive community, regular communication and feedback, prompt support and advice

item5.title: Library
item5.description: A collection of links to the most useful resources in the crypto industry in various areas: CEX, DEX, Wallets, Analytics and more...

item6.title: Whale Alert
item6.description: Tracking and publishing large transactions, burnings and printings within blockchains (in magical style!)

platform.title: platform
platform.subtitle: Track the performance of all your investments in one convenient and understandable place
platform.notice: We are constantly working on improving the platform and strive to make it as convenient and useful as possible for everyone. More cool features coming soon!

item1.title: Portfolio
item1.description: Track the performance of your portfolios in a convenient interface. 3 types of portfolios: stock, virtual and venture

item2.title: Forum
item2.description: Create articles about cryptocurrencies, chat and discuss ideas, comment and vote for the best posts

item3.title: Academy
item3.description: Upgrade your knowledge of blockchain and cryptocurrencies, complete training courses and get achievements

item4.title: Profile
item4.description: Evolve your character, collect daily rewards and get unique achievements for being active

nft.title: Unique NFT Hamsters for true dusters!
nft.description:
For the first 10,000 subscribers, we've made a historic promotion! When you
 subscribe to Cryptocommunity or All in one for the first time, you
 will receive a unique Hamster NFT. access to future products and
 company events.

hamster_modal.description: You can only create a hamster with the subscription name “Cryptocommunity” or “All in One”. The generated hamster is permanently assigned to you. Each hamster has a rarity from Common to Rare and unique generation properties: Background, Emote, Thing, Headgear

step1.title: Step 1
step1.description: Connect your discord account to the profile

step2.title: Step 2
step2.description: Go to Dust Foundation Discord and verify

step3.title: Step 3
step3.description: Open the “Generation” channel in the “Community” section

step5.title: Step 5
step5.description: Congratulations, your coolest hamster has been generated!

subscriptions.title: Our Subscriptions
subscriptions.tabs_notification: Subscribe for {{ term }} days and get {{ bonus_term }} days free!
